settings.text:
Try Circolo for 30 days, risk-free, with our in-home trial. Try our immersive workout experience right from your home - and if it’s not for you, we’ll provide a full refund.

If you’re eligible for Circolo's home trial and have purchased directly from our website, you can try your Circolo Mirror and any accessories for up to 30 days after your delivery, risk-free. If you're not satisfied with your Circolo experience, simply contact Circolo Member Services within 30 days of delivery, and we'll arrange a free pickup of your Circle Mirror and accessories. Once your return is complete, you’ll receive a full refund for the Mirror and any accessories.

If you have any additional questions, please visit our FAQ page or contact us at support@circolo.us.
